price: 25. Yalli Aadam kee Cawwaay ken samadak iyyeh:baaxô bagul addunyal taniinih gide mano teetil Aallettoonuuh tet bagul Rabetton, sin Rabbi Qhiyaamah ayró teetik sin ayyaaqele.
arabic: قَالَ فِيهَا تَحۡيَوۡنَ وَفِيهَا تَمُوتُونَ وَمِنۡهَا تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla fīhā taḥyawna wafīhā tamūtūna wamin'hā tukh'rajūna
